notices.resources.title: Where to find resources to learn {language}
notices.resources.description.storedInRe: Our resources are stored in a [GitHub repository]({link}). The button below will take you there as well.
notices.resources.description.easierToMa: Storing the resources externally makes them much easier to manage and organise in a digestible format, as well as accessible to the outside world and easily contributable.
notices.resources.description.contributa: You can submit new resources in one of three ways, in increasing levels of hassle:
Opening an issue in the repository, mentioning the resources to add.
Forking the repository, adding the resources as needed, and creating a pull request.
